description:
《吸血鬼日记》第五季第三集官方剧情简介：

When Elena and Katherine have the same dream that Stefan is in danger and desperately needs their help, they convince Damon to help them find Stefan. However, their plans are thwarted by a mysterious young woman named Tessa (guest star Janina Gavankar) who seems to know everything about Stefan’s history. In flashbacks to a distant time and place, Tessa reveals the shocking secrets in her past and what she has planned for the future. She also has a disturbing message for Damon about his own future.Elena和Katherine做了同样的一个梦，在梦中Stefan处于危险之中且非常需要她们的帮助，于是她们俩说服Damon一起去找Stefan。然而他们的营救计划却被一个名叫Tessa的神秘年轻女人给破坏了，这个人看起来对Stefan的过去了如指掌。在一段闪回片段中，Tessa揭露了一个自己关于自己过去的惊人秘密，以及她的未来打算。另外她还给Damon的未来送来一个让人不安的消息。

Silas forces an unwilling accomplice to help him search for Katherine, leading to a confusing and life-threatening situation for Matt. Finally, Silas reveals the reason he’s determined to find Katherine, and Damon and Elena face a disturbing new reality.Silas逼着某个极度不愿意合作的人帮他寻找Katherine的下落，这也让Matt身陷危险境地。最终Silas说出了自己寻找Katherine的原因，而Damon和Elena则需面对一个令人不安的新问题。
